Author: armheartbrain
Text: Yeah. And they don't even appreciate it. I figure it's like having a headache. When you have a headache you think about how much better it would feel to not have a headache and think about all the people walking around living happy lives without headaches. Then when you have a headache you never think "oh man. Glad I don't have a headache."

Author: harmfulrash
Text: I think about this alllllllll the tiiiiiiiime. kind of trying to recover unassisted and it's like ?!?! I literally don't know what "normal" is .. idk how to eat like a "normal"/"healthy" person ?! lol finally admitted to myself I can't do this alone and have to see a dietician at least or something cos I have no fucking clue where to even start.   Not even jus with eating either tho like .. it is so hard for me to understand how some people just ?? don't care ?!?! about anything that haunts me and cripples me every day ?! like I can't imagine not worrying about if I can wrap my hand around my wrist / if this shirt makes my stomach look ick / am I going to gain 20 pounds from eating this piece of chocolate lmao like .. I can't imagine living a life without worrying about all of that I feel like my brain is permanently wired to think about all of that ..  omg .. anywaYS . yes lmao
